<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 315, 571, 333]]<|/det|> ## 3. Elementares Rechnen mit komplexen Zahlen <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 331, 852, 366]]<|/det|> Berechnen Sie jeweils die Summe \(z_1 + z_2\), die Differenz \(z_1 - z_2\), das Produkt \(z_1 \cdot z_2\) und den Quotienten \(z_1/z_2\) der gegebenen komplexen Zahlen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 365, 256, 381]]<|/det|> a) \(z_1 = 3\), \(z_2 = i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 380, 339, 398]]<|/det|> b) \(z_1 = i\), \(z_2 = 3\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 396, 344, 414]]<|/det|> c) \(z_1 = 2 + 3i\), \(z_2 = 2 + 3i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 411, 345, 429]]<|/det|> d) \(z_1 = 3 + 4i\), \(z_2 = 3 - 4i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 427, 320, 445]]<|/det|> e) \(z_1 = -3 + 4i\), \(z_2 = -3 - 4i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 443, 310, 461]]<|/det|> f) \(z_1 = 4 + 9i\), \(z_2 = 3 + 7i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 458, 264, 476]]<|/det|> g) \(z_1 = 6 + i\), \(z_2 = 1 - i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 473, 264, 491]]<|/det|> h) \(z_1 = -2 - 2i\), \(z_2 = -3 + i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 488, 264, 506]]<|/det|> i) \(z_1 = 7i\), \(z_2 = 9i\) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 515, 546, 533]]<|/det|> ## 4. Rechenregeln der komplexen Konjugation <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 532, 822, 566]]<|/det|> Zeigen Sie, dass für die komplexen Zahlen die folgenden Rechenregeln für die komplexe Konjugation gelten. <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 565, 707, 584]]<|/det|> \[a) (z_1 + z_2)^* = z_1^* + z_2^* \quad b) (z_1 - z_2)^* = z_1^* - z_2^*\] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 583, 707, 616]]<|/det|> \[c) (z_1 \cdot z_2)^* = z_1^* \cdot z_2^* \quad d) \left(\frac{z_1}{z_2}\right)^* = \frac{z_1^*}{z_2^*} \quad \text{mit } z_2 \neq 0\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 582, 144, 599]]<|/det|> a) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 599, 178, 616]]<|/det|> Es gilt <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 625, 789, 721]]<|/det|> \[\begin{align*} (z_1 + z_2)^* &= \left((x_1 + y_1i) + (x_2 + y_2i)\right)^* = (x_1 + y_1i + x_2 + y_2i)^* \\ &= \left(x_1 + x_2 + (y_1 + y_2) \cdot i\right)^* = x_1 + x_2 - (y_1 + y_2) \cdot i = x_1 + x_2 - y_1i - y_2i \\ &= (x_1 - y_1i) + (x_2 - y_2i) = z_1^* + z_2^*. \end{align*}\] <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 723, 144, 740]]<|/det|> b) <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 740, 178, 757]]<|/det|> Es gilt <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 767, 677, 858]]<|/det|> \[\begin{align*} (z_1 - z_2)^* &= \left((x_1 + y_1i) - (x_2 + y_2i)\right)^* = (x_1 +y_1i - x_2 - y_2i)^* \\ &= \left(x_1 - x_2 + (y_1 - y_2) \cdot i\right)^* = x_1 - x_2 - (y_1 - y_2) \cdot i = x_1 - x_2 - y_1i + y_2i \\ &= (x_1 - y_1i) - (x_2 - y_2i) = z_1^* - z_2^*. \end{align*}\]
